ComicInfo.Summary:
"DEAD MAN'S HAND," Part Four
In the aftermath of the chase, Bobby and Lucy narrowly escape their pursuers and seek refuge with the only person who can help them: the other woman! Meanwhile, Irvine and his dirty cops step up their hunt for Bobby, unwilling to let the sole witness to their massacre escape. As they consider their options, Bobby and Lucy realize they can only elude Irvine for so long. And when unlucky chance brings them face to face with their pursuers again, a dramatic rooftop confrontation leaves Bobby at the mercy of the men who want him dead!
ComicInfo.Title: Dead Man's Hand, Part 4
